data.text: These are sayings/messages that God gave to King Lemuel’s mother, and which his mother taught him:
You are my son; I gave birth to you [RHQ];
Do not exhaust your energy having sex [EUP] with women to whom you are not married,
Lemuel, kings should not be constantly drinking wine
If they do that, they forget the laws that they have made,
Give strong/alcoholic drinks to those who are dying
If they drink, they will forget that they are poor,
Speak [MTY] to defend people who are unable to defend themselves;
Speak [MTY] ◄on their behalf/to help them► and try to cause judges to decide matters fairly/justly;
It is very difficult for a man to [RHQ] find a wife who is good and who is capable of doing many things.
Her husband completely trusts her,
She never does anything that would harm him;
She finds wool and flax in the market,
She is like [SIM] a ship that brings from far away goods/merchandise to sell,
She gets up before dawn to prepare food for her family.
She goes out and looks at a field that someone wants to sell;
She works very hard [IDM];
She knows when she is getting a good profit from her business.
She holds the ◄spindle/rod which twists the thread that she is making►,
She generously helps [MTY] those who are poor and needy [DOU].
She is not worried that the people in her house will be cold in the winter,
She makes bedspreads/quilts for the beds.
Her husband is well known by the important people of the town;
She makes clothes from linen cloth and sells them.
She is strong in her character and respected/dignified,
When she speaks, she says what is wise.
She watches over everything that is done in her household,
Her children all together speak highly of her,
He says to her, “There are many women who do admirable things,
Some women who are attractive are not really good women,
Reward women who are like that,
